We provide a helper method which aims to make plotting indicators simple. For further information on the charting API please see our Charting section.

private Trix _trix;

// In Initialize()
var symbol = AddEquity("SPY").Symbol;
_trix = TRIX(symbol, period);

// In OnData()
if (_trix.IsReady)
{
    Plot("My Indicators", "TRIX Current", _trix.Current);
}
# In Initialize()
symbol = self.AddEquity("SPY").Symbol
self.trix = self.TRIX(symbol, period)

# In OnData()
if self.trix.IsReady:
    self.Plot("My Indicators", "TRIX Current", self.trix.Current);
